text: This may have been the most amazing fireworks show I've ever seen. Canada's show was just OK (sorry Canada!), but Spain's was great and Korea's-- I didn't know where to look, there was so much going on at once!!Great food and tons of cheap ballooons/glowsticks and junk your kids will beg you for. Super crowded, so if you want a riverfront seat get in early. It's worth it!

This festival be held at Yeouido. This is the best fireworks in Seoul because the fireworks are synchronized with screens, music, and lasers. So many people or tourists came to Yeouido to see this festival.
